author: tng
msg: Pulled the hardcoded "encoding" out of the document itself and made it a #define to make it easier to support other encodings.  Fixed by Carolyn Weiss.

author: tng
msg: Changed some literal values to their equivalent hex values so they work correctly on both ascii and EBCDIC systems.  Fixed by Carolyn Weiss.

author: tng
msg: Bug Fix: maxChars in copyNString is more related to the target than the src.  Fixed by Linda Swan.

author: tng
msg: Fix comment log that lead to error.

author: tng
msg: Performance: Create QName in ContentSpecNode only if it is a leaf/Any*/PCDataNode.
